com.guidewire.ab.webservices.api

Interface IGroupAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IGroupAPISoapBindingStub

    public interface IGroupAPI
extends java.rmi.Remote
    IGroupAPI provides mechanisms for adding new Groups to and obtaining information for existing Groups from ClaimCenter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addGroup(Group groupData)
      Adds the given group data to the system.
      java.lang.String findPublicIdByName(java.lang.String groupName)
      Finds the public id of a group by the name.
      Group getGroup(java.lang.String groupID)
      Retrieves a group given the group identifier or returns null if no group could be found.

    • Method Detail

      • addGroup

        java.lang.String addGroup(Group groupData)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                 ServerStateException,
                                 RequiredFieldException,
                                 DataConversionException,
                                 PermissionException,
                                 DuplicateKeyException,
                                 BadIdentifierException
        Adds the given group data to the system. if the data object doesn't contain a PublicID, one will be assigned. The parent, grouptype, and securityzone of the group data cannot be null.
        Parameters:
        groupData - The GroupData object
        Returns:
        The public identifier of the group data object.
        Throws:
        ServerStateException - Thrown when a request is made at a time the server is in a state that disallows the request.
        RequiredFieldException - If any of the required fields are missing.
        DataConversionException
        PermissionException - Thrown when the authenticated SOAP user does not have permission to perform the requested operation
        DuplicateKeyException - If the group has a public id that exists already.
        BadIdentifierException - Thrown when an internal public ID doesn't map to a real bean (problem could be that type was incorrect)
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a communication error occurs

      • findPublicIdByName

        java.lang.String findPublicIdByName(java.lang.String groupName)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                           ServerStateException,
                                           PermissionException,
                                           BadIdentifierException
        Finds the public id of a group by the name.
        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the group to match
        Returns:
        the matching group's publicId, or null if no Group exists with the given name.
        Throws:
        ServerStateException - Thrown when a request is made at a time the server is in a state that disallows the request.
        PermissionException - Thrown when the authenticated SOAP user does not have permission to perform the requested operation
        BadIdentifierException - Thrown when an internal public ID doesn't map to a real bean (problem could be that type was incorrect)
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a communication error occurs

      • getGroup

        Group getGroup(java.lang.String groupID)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                      ServerStateException,
                      PermissionException,
                      BadIdentifierException
        Retrieves a group given the group identifier or returns null if no group could be found.
        Parameters:
        groupID -
        Returns:
        The GroupData representing the group
        Throws:
        ServerStateException - Thrown when a request is made at a time the server is in a state that disallows the request.
        PermissionException - Thrown when the authenticated SOAP user does not have permission to perform the requested operation
        BadIdentifierException - Thrown when an internal public ID doesn't map to a real bean (problem could be that type was incorrect)
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a communication error occurs
